amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that none of the provisions of the bill shall apply to any claim based on personal injury, including any claim asserted by way of counterclaim, cross claim or third party claim; and clarifies that third party defendants brought into Y2K personal injury claims are not provided with the liability protections contained in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 and printed in Part 2 of H. Rept. 106-134 to exempt all claims that arise out of an underlying action for personal injury.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran (VA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
